description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

Enhancements:

SLIDESNET-34457	Create separate fonts collections for every presentation
SLIDESNET-34459	Performance issue when getting table coordinates
SLIDESNET-34536	Update code examples in doc files

Investigations:

SLIDESNET-33148	Transparent images becomes non-transparent upon Load/Save
SLIDESNET-34157	What is mapping of AdjustValueEx.RawValue to actual slide shape values in PowerPoint

Bugs:

SLIDESNET-31612	Aspose.Slides generated charts failed to get edited when opened in PowerPoint
SLIDESNET-33557	The X-axis values for charts are improperly rendered in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33814	Embedded true type fonts failed to render in generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33868	Chart is rendered improperly in PDF
SLIDESNET-33869	Chart font text is improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34133	Wrong substitution of font when this font is not available
SLIDESNET-34313	NullReference Exception on accessing presentation
SLIDESNET-34317	Text get skewed on generating the slide thumbnail with reduced slide size
SLIDESNET-34337	Extra legend values are rendered in PDF
SLIDESNET-34410	Charts missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34423	Not a Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 presentation on exporting to PDF
SLIDESNET-34424	Chart is missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34426	Category axis labels are missing or improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34429	Wrong bullet characters are rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34433	Text underline is missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34436	Overlapping text in chart series labels
SLIDESNET-34437	Chart series label is missing
SLIDESNET-34438	Chart title by default are rendered on Charts
SLIDESNET-34439	Lines are missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34441	Wrong Callout shape color (gradient fill) is rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34443	Border rendered incorrectly in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34445	Bullet character is rendered with bigger font size
SLIDESNET-34446	Table lines broke up in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34461	Wrong text baseline position in ppt API rendering
SLIDESNET-34464	Text improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34475	Slide name gets rendered in generated Html
SLIDESNET-34506	Extra legend key on thumbnail 
SLIDESNET-34507	Category axis labels are drawing in two lines
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
